document.topic_text: New 'Flower Power' winner named By Daily Globe Today at 9:41 p.m. WORTHINGTON -- The Worthington Area Chamber of Commerce through the Community Improvement Committee is sponsoring a “Flower Power -- Yard of the Week.” This week’s recipient is Troy Langland, 1702 Viking Road. Anyone is eligible to nominate a residence as a candidate for the “Flower Power -- Yard of the Week.” Nominations can be made by calling the Chamber office at 372-2919.
document.post: New 'Flower Power' winner named By Daily Globe Today at 9:41 p.m. WORTHINGTON -- The Worthington Area Chamber of Commerce through the Community Improvement Committee is sponsoring a “Flower Power -- Yard of the Week.” This week’s recipient is Troy Langland, 1702 Viking Road. Anyone is eligible to nominate a residence as a candidate for the “Flower Power -- Yard of the Week.” Nominations can be made by calling the Chamber office at 372-2919.
